feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing conditional removal of the Player start button and its related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and utility setup with extensive light/dark CSS variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell defining root mount point, manifest, theme color, and script entry.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest with app metadata, colors, orientation, and icons.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router layout with header logic and bottom tab navigation, hiding footer on the Player page.
Breathing animation circle with phase-based colors, countdown text, and optional progress ring.
frontend/src/components/charts/BreathHol: Draws a simple line chart of breath-hold durations over time with labeled endpoints.
frontend/src/components/charts/WeeklyMin: Shows a bar chart of weekly exercise minutes with proportional bar heights.
frontend/src/components/CustomPatternFor: Form for editing custom breathing pattern durations with numeric inputs.
frontend/src/components/ExerciseTileCard: Clickable exercise card with icon, description, and optional info button.
frontend/src/components/HomeExerciseCard: Exercise card with duration setting dialog and start interaction handling.
frontend/src/components/SegmentedCircumf: Renders an SVG circular progress indicator split into timed segments and fills segments based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/components/SessionList.tsx: Displays a table of past breathing sessions with formatted dates and durations.
frontend/src/components/VerticalVolumeCo: Provides a vertical slider for volume control with optional icon display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBreathingEngine.ts: Implements a timed breathing cycle engine with phases, voice cues, haptics, and pause/resume logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useHaptics.ts: Provides a simple vibration helper using the browser's vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and persistent identities via context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePerExerciseDuratio: Stores and retrieves per-exercise default durations using local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and releases a screen wake lock based on active state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling, theme variables, fonts, and breathing animation keyframes.
frontend/src/lib/ambientAudio.ts: Controls looping rain and waves audio with volume adjustment and exclusive playback.
frontend/src/lib/breathingPatterns.ts: Defines BreathingPattern and provides preset breathing pattern configurations.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageStore.ts: Provides helpers to read and write breath-hold records, breathing sessions, and per-exercise durations to localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/playerDurationGuards.ts: Validates session duration values and determines when auto-stop is allowed based on elapsed time.
frontend/src/lib/sessionTypes.ts: Defines types for breath-hold records and breathing sessions with timestamps and durations.
frontend/src/lib/statsDerivations.ts: Computes last 7 days of session minutes, transforms breath-hold data, and extracts recent sessions.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Contains string keys used for localStorage entries.
frontend/src/lib/voiceGuidance.ts: Manages voice volume and provides speech synthesis functions including async and queued speaking.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with app info, premium features section, and quick settings.
frontend/src/pages/Custom.tsx: Allows users to create and start a custom breathing pattern using a form.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays preset breathing exercises and a breath-holding test with navigation to the player.
frontend/src/pages/Player.tsx: Runs the breathing session player with pattern loading, audio control, voice guidance, duration handling, and auto-stop logic.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Renders the Settings page with toggles for audio, haptics, and notification preferences using cards and switches.
frontend/src/pages/Stats.tsx: Displays weekly practice minutes, breath-hold trends, and recent sessions by loading data from localStorage and rendering charts and tables.
frontend/src/pages/Test.tsx: Implements a breath-hold timer with start/stop controls, tracking elapsed time and updating all‑time records in localStorage.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load to enable PWA functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, screens, border radii, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s feature inventory, versioning, and a high-level summary of the app’s capabilities.
